title: List of airports in Connecticut
text:
This is a list of <a href="airport">airport</a>s in <a href="Connecticut">Connecticut</a> (a <a href="U.S.%20state">U.S. state</a>), grouped by type and sorted by location. It contains all public-use and military airports in the state. Some private-use and former airports may be included where notable, such as airports that were previously public-use, those with commercial enplanements recorded by the <a href="Federal%20Aviation%20Administration">FAA</a> or airports assigned an <a href="International%20Air%20Transport%20Association">IATA</a> airport code.
References.
<a href="Federal%20Aviation%20Administration">Federal Aviation Administration</a> (FAA):
<a href="Connecticut%20Department%20of%20Transportation">Connecticut Department of Transportation</a> (ConnDOT):
